descriptionHtml:
[font=Comic Sans MS][size=5][u][b][center]Half-Moon Camp[/center][/b][/u][/size][/font]
[font=Trebuchet MS][size=3][b][u]What does this do?[/u][/b][/size]
[size=2]It adds a small camp near Lady Stone and Half-Moon Mill. [/size]

[size=3][b][u]How to install/Uninstall[/u][/b][/size]
[/font]
[u]Nexus Mod Manager[/u] [color=#088A29](Recommended)[/color]
1. Click on the Download with Manager button
2. Install it using NMM
3. Done!

[u]Uninstall[/u]
1. Right click on the Half-Moon Camp and click on Uninstall and delete archive
2. My lord, your camp is gone! 

[u]Manually[/u] [color=#cc0000](Not Recommended)[/color]
1. Download Half-Moon Camp (of course)
2. When It's done downloading open Half-Moon Camp.rar
3. Move Half-Moon Camp.esp to Skyrim\Data folder
4. Enable Half-Moon Camp.esp file in Skyrim Launcher, Wrye Bash or in any other software you use to enable/disable your mods
5. Done!

[u]Uninstall
[/u]1. Delete the Half-Moon Camp.esp
2. Where did my camp go?

[u]Updating
[/u]Replace the old .esp file with the new one.

[size=3][u][b]Requirements[/b][/u] [/size]
Hearthfires DLC and Dawnguard DLC

[u][b][size=3]Location[/size]
[/b][/u]Near Lady Stone and Half-Moon Mill (See pictures)

[u][b][size=3]Changelog[/size][/b][/u]
*UPDATE v2.0* [CHECK OUT THE IMAGES]
-Made stable bigger
-Added Map Marker. You can now fast travel to HMC
HMC = Half-Moon Camp

*UPDATE v1.0* [UPLOADED IMAGES]
-Added Small Stable to Half-Moon Camp
-Added wild chicken to the stable

[size=4][size=5]Please be sure to Rate and Endorse! Also check out my other Mod(s). Thank you![/size][/size]
author: FinAllu2
